name: PONG GAME (jastinel)
description:
How To Play

Player 1:

  • Press 'W' key to move paddle to up
  • Press 'S' key to move paddle to down

Player 2:

  • Press up arrow key to move paddle to up
  • Press down arrow key to move paddle to down

Pause menu:

  • Press 'space' key to pause and press it again to resume
